Text: Good Weekend To Buy A Car Time To Use Your Draft Presidents Day weekend is a great time to buy a car The approaching holiday is the perfect time to use your ELOAN check draft to buy a car Save money by combining Presidents day dealer sales with ELOANs low loan rates Use the following tips to ensure that you get the best deal possible Do your research Research your cars invoice price and MSRP before you visit the dealer Click here for more information a href servletccLsgEWCBrLOpgEoSHmmQLgkhgEJhtzUA Talk to the Internet Sales Manager Dealing directly with the ISM can often help you negotiate the best price for your car Determine your monthly payment You can affect your monthly payment by adjusting the term of your loan Use ELOANs auto payment calculator to design a payment structure that works for you a href servletccLsgEWCBrLOpgEoSHmmQLgkhgEJhtzVA Maximize your tradein Sell your existing car yourself to maximize its value If you do trade it in clean and repair your car to enhance its appeal Determine your down payment Down payment is a matter of preference However thanks to your low ELOAN rate your cash may be better used elsewhere Use Manufacturer Rebates and Cash Back Incentives to reduce the amount you have to finance Remember using your ELOAN check draft is easy Once youve negotiated the price for your car simply fill out and sign the draft and provide the required documentation to the Internet Sales Manager Then drive away in your new car If you have any questions about your loan please feel free to call our toll free number ELOAN Best regards Joe Kennedy President ELOAN Inc This message was sent by ELOAN Inc using Responsys Interact TM If you prefer not to receive future email from ELOAN Inc servletoptoutLsgDVBAErLOpgDoRHmmFLgkhgDJhtEf To view our permission marketing policy
